Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fact = fix fact (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0 => 1 | S n0 => S n0 * fact n0 end : nat -> nat Arguments fact _%nat_scope
div = fun q p : nat => projT1 (div_full q p) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments div (_ _)%nat_scope
binomial = fix binomial (n p : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S _ => 0 end | S n0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S p0 => binomial n0 p0 + binomial n0 (S p0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments binomial (_ _)%nat_scope
binomial_thm : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
div_ge_1 : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> forall n : nat, p <= n -> 1 <= div n p
div_by_p_lt : forall p n : nat, 2 <= p -> n <> 0 -> div n p < n
div_eq_0 : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> forall n : nat, n < p -> div n p = 0
binomial_SS : forall n p : nat, binomial (S n) (S p) = binomial n p + binomial n (S p)
fact_S : forall n : nat, fact (S n) = S n * fact n

```coq
intros.
assert (H1 : p <= n).
exact H.
assert (H2 : fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)).
apply binomial_thm; auto.
rewrite H2.
assert (H3 : div (fact n) (fact p * fact (n - p)) = div (binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)) (fact p * fact (n - p))).
reflexivity.
rewrite <- H3.
assert (H4 : div (fact n) (fact p * fact (n - p)) = binomial n p).
rewrite H2.
assert (H5 : div (binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)) (fact p * fact (n - p)) = binomial n p).
rewrite H2.
rewrite H5.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. assert (H1 : p <= n). apply H. assert (H2 : fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)). apply binomial_thm; auto. rewrite H2. assert (H3 : div (fact n) (fact p * fact (n - p)) = div (binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)) (fact p * fact (n - p))). reflexivity. rewrite <- H3. assert (H4 : div (fact n) (fact p * fact (n - p)) = binomial n p). rewrite H2. assert (H5 : div (binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)) (fact p * fact (n - p)) = binomial n p). rewrite H2. rewrite H5. auto.
